snippet: Château Angélus, which has worked to raise its cachet, was elevated on Thursday to the highest of three "cru" ranks for fine Saint- Émilion wines.
abstract: Château Angélus, which has worked to raise its cachet, was elevated on Thursday to the highest of three "cru" ranks for fine Saint- Émilion wines.

headline.main: Forget the Martini; 007 Will Have the Wine
